title: T-Mobile Internet Freedom delivers $50 5G home internet plan with perks
content:
T-Mobile debuted its 5G home internet service a little over a year ago. Today, it has launched a new promotion, hoping to provide consumers with a new way to experience shopping for home internet service.Â During its first Un-carrier event of 2022, T-Mobile shared its Internet Freedom strategy. This strategy will attempt to give consumers a

The post T-Mobile Internet Freedom delivers $50 5G home internet plan with perks appeared first on XDA.
description: T-Mobile debuted its Internet Freedom plan, giving consumers a new way to shop for home internet. The new plan costs $50.
